website_summaries.verdict: The whole family will enjoy these affordable and colorful cell phone lanyards.
pros: Lanyard sits at a low price point
Braided rope design is strong and reliable
Comes with 5 multi-colored lanyards, perfect to share with the whole family
Attaches easily to most smart phones, USB drives, and cameras
cons: Touch screen does not work well when fully submerged in water

customer_reviews.title: Will break and drop your phone
customer_reviews.text: Straps falls off every time and drops cell on the ground. Don't buy it. I'm on my 4th one from this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Lomborg

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made Lanyards
customer_reviews.text: These do not seem like a cheap set of lanyards at all! Bought these for my kids' mp3 players, they work perfectly for little necks, though they fit great on my own neck at average height as well. The detachable keyring does not come off easily, no worrying about losing that. Just press the little silver button and pull the keyring off (even with the button pressed, the keyring doesn't just slip off without being pulled slightly). Easy-to-use. I would definitely buy these again if I needed more for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia313

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart from first touch.
customer_reviews.text: this just works for a one day use. The gems were already falling off when I removed them from the package. They are stuck onto the lanyard with some sort of tape. And of course, your hair gets all stuck to it too!! Absolute nightmare and total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Flo

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these each holiday season for coworkers. The one year I changed it up and bought something else, they seemed disappointed. Apparently, they looked forward to a fresh lanyard and new colors each year. I also add a mini light to it, that clips onto the badge holder, for nightshifters. Better quality than some other brands I’ve gotten and a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: CYNDI

customer_reviews.title: An absolute necessity!
customer_reviews.text: These lanyards are a lifesaver for any activity that could put your phone or other small electronics at risk. I never go snow skiing without one. Having my phone attached to the lanyard gives me peace of mind knowing that even if I accidentally let go of it while on a chairlift or anywhere else where, if not attached, it could end up lost in deep snow. For the more than reasonable price (less than $8.00 for five lanyards!) I highly recommend that everyone who is active outdoors (skiing, boating, biking, etc.) purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: dsand1423

customer_reviews.title: not retractable!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn't read the description right, but this is just a cord with a plastic piece on the end. The thin cord connected to the circle will snap off, but the cord is way too short to be functional.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep on my mask for Co-vid19. Because when I'm in the car I keep forgetting to grab my mask. So this helps me not forget it or lose it because it's around my kneck. I also put one on my cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: Nikia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Almost broke my iPhone using this product
customer_reviews.text: almost broke my iPhone using this product. I had it hanging on my case to my new Iphone and it broke and dropped on the ground ...good thing I had a case on it that was durable because if not that would have been an epic failed...
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Never miss a phone call or have to hunt for my phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most convenient way to carry my phone, especially while doing things like grocery shopping. I hate carrying my phone around and my children complain when I miss their calls. Now I never do. I love the different colors, too.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Belcher

customer_reviews.title: PVC binder organizer~ perfectly
customer_reviews.text: "I use this product in the creation of employee binders to keep company processes and information organized and clean. These tab dividers are exactly what I expected, with generously sized tabs which stick out from all of the papers much better than the ones that do not call themselves extrawide. These are made of the standard paper that such things are generally made of, and I don't really see any difference between this and the Avery brand ones that I already owned. They seem reasonably sturdy and are exactly what I would expect from this product."
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: release convenient
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect! The colors were great. The lanyards were sturdy. We used these for a cruise and the loop and release were so convenient. We appreciated not having to keep taking the lanyard off from around our necks to swipe our things whenever we needed to. They weren’t uncomfortable around our necks neither. I’ll definitely order again if I need to and will definitely recommend them to anyone who needs them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robison

customer_reviews.title: Really good!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return cause wrong type, but wish I could have kept it. Really great quality and looked perfect if I could have used it. Fast refund turnaround - good company.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. However these are not cellphone wrist straps so much as cellphone necklaces. They are huge.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Brewer

customer_reviews.title: So durable
customer_reviews.text: I work in a back office and need my keys handy because I'm always in and out. I can't believe how durable these lanyards are and there is always the bling factor!! Haven't lost a stone yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty... but that's it
customer_reviews.text: It rips my hair out. The "rhinestones" come "unstuck" and grab hair, as well as some spots were missing them on one when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: KaylaNavy

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: One out of 5 center chrome button is stuck and can’t release. It seems some degrading on the plastic chrome like those leaking battery buildup. Return them.
customer_reviews.author: DL_AMG

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and great value
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive, easy to use and great value! One lanyard was missing bottom snap on piece and I contacted seller. They replies quickly and are correcting problem ...plus sending a gift. Excellent service. Love this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: LE King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for thumb drives
customer_reviews.text: With thumb drives getting smaller, I need these to keep track of them. Haven't lost one since using these strong, well-built, handsome landyards.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: It works great, just like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Now I xan find my phone without searching all over the house and in my pants. Only problem, don't eat soup while wearing it unless you tuck in your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but small
customer_reviews.text: Looks like great product but I returned because they were too small. Would work better for tiny wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Brittles

customer_reviews.title: Neck part is not durable
customer_reviews.text: Got as gifts to my friends, everyone like it. I used one and it lasts for one month only
customer_reviews.author: irina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality how do I return??????
customer_reviews.text: These sucked only 2 showed up and are missing lots of diamonds I was not able to use any of the 2 lanyards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ideal for usb drives too
customer_reviews.text: perfect got badges or usb drives which is what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: michael williams

customer_reviews.title: easy clean surface
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pad to be resistance to dirt, food, and liquids. Over time the cloth type get nasty.This is wipe and go. This is well made with a smooth surface that the mouse glides on.
customer_reviews.author: David & Debra

customer_reviews.title: Kept losing pens over and over and over at work ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept losing pens over and over and over at work. Finally am able to keep track of them. Change out my colors each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up well. The reel fell apart within a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: anacrusis

customer_reviews.title: colorful, cute~ perfect for any girly
customer_reviews.text: These are just to add to a ring binder/ organiser and do not include the actual binder or note book. They are very pretty though and perfect for any girly girls. The zippers and pouches are strong and perfect for storing pens, stationary, sticker sheets, or any little crafty bits and bobs. Have also used for hair accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Olds

customer_reviews.title: Its good but it would have been better if its a ...
customer_reviews.text: We use when we went on a cruise to hold our room card...Its good but it would have been better if its a little longer....coz u ended up bending over or taking it off when u open ur door.
customer_reviews.author: Kevanz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love never losing track of my phone anymore! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Great value at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great value at great price! I basically got 5 for the price of 1 local and its just as good if not better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Szb

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through my cruise!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use as my cruise card lanyard and it worked will. I liked that I could just unclip my card without taking the whole lanyard off my neck to had to a bartender or attendant.
customer_reviews.author: EDWIN TOLENTINO

customer_reviews.title: very strong
customer_reviews.text: Love these lanyards! They are easy to use, and switch off if necessary for a particular “outfit”. I got the white, gray, black combo which covers everything you might wear. I also love the retractable feature.
customer_reviews.author: marvell

customer_reviews.title: ID Card Lanyard
customer_reviews.text: Love this lanyard! It’s round not flat and absolutely brilliant pretty pink. It has to options for your badge. A clip or snap which you can Retract.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I use these for my phone and my keys. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my phone and my keys. They are really cute because they are different to the usual ones that are thicker and bulkier. Plus they came faster than expected
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Got 5 of them in a pack, keeps the phone around my dad’s neck so he won’t lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Kent G. Stannard

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, good size for wrist
customer_reviews.text: very well made... sturdy but attractive... I'm using it on several electronic gadgets... and a wallet... nice to have a selection of colors
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today. I am required to wear an ID at work, and my current lanyard was worn and dirty. I like how lightweight this one is, and that is seems it can be wiped/ cleaned, unlike fabric lanyards.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Allenfeg

customer_reviews.title: Great clip
customer_reviews.text: I do like these and the clip is a nice feature. they are as advertised as 18", which is a bit snug going around my head. I think I would choose a longer length next time.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Ryerson

customer_reviews.title: Great a5 dividers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect binder for bullet journaling! I am left handed so being able to take pages in and out is crucial. It also comes with a ruler and pouch, and three different kinds of paper (dotted, lined and graph) so it has literally everything you need. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: norma carrillo

customer_reviews.title: These are very short. They fit your wrist, ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very short. They fit your wrist, but are not something you can hang around your neck. (Which is what I wanted.)
customer_reviews.author: dnb

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about durability as only time will tell but they seem to be very well made and quite the assortment for the price! I've dropped my phone much less lately so thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best Lanyard Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for my work keys- I’m a nurse.

customer_reviews.title: 4.7 stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended -really inexpensive compared to other competitors -works well for my cellphone. Of course you will need a cellphone case for your phone first to attach the neck string -minor dissatisfaction: the string can be a bit longer by maybe just two inches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon008

customer_reviews.title: Never lose your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I have a disability this product enables me to wear my iPhone around my neck. If it were longer it would be much better. Phone must be in a case.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter just loves this. I bought this to hold camera

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I am finding many things to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I am finding many things to put these on

customer_reviews.title: Really cute..
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lanyard .. they are like braided.. really cute.. have different cute colors.. would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Can I get me another one
customer_reviews.text: I had three packages but to that was missing is that rancco 5 pcs detachable cell phone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my vape pen to help me not lose it. Great quality. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, strong, just what I was looking for. I've received multiple compliments on it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Great quality. I use it as a keychain.

customer_reviews.title: easy to installation
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a recent Caribbean cruise. For my four and five year old daughters we just tied a knot in the back of the lanyard and it fit them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Nice selection of color. I use it with a phone ring and wear my phone. Works great! No more worrying about it falling out of my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They may not be the prettiest in the world but they serve its purpose. The bottom line is...they have held up to some abuse and have come out on the other side.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I have a wardrobe of lanyards for different outfits

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice. A little bigger than I expected but will still do the job.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for lightweight items
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for ID badge but I wouldn’t use it with a cellphone or anything heavy or expensive.

customer_reviews.title: filofox inserts.
customer_reviews.text: This PVC is thick, I love this binder more than I can explain. Its flexible and the size makes it perfect for carrying around in a purse!

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The black one came with rhinestones missing, and then broke within the two days from getting them. The other ones are starting to clamps lose
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: I like using this with my cell phone especially when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like using this with my cell phone especially when I am traveling. It so convenient to detach from the clip to take pictures than having to search for my phone inside my purse. I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: ase

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about the durability of the string and clasp but I haven’t had and issue after prolonged use. Cute braid design in multiple colors as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. When I am in Rome, it is a secure way I can carry my cell around my neck and take pictures without ever having my phone in a compromising situation. It is attached to me and not easily grabbed away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice blingy lanyard
customer_reviews.text: Great lanyards for the price....three for the price of one. Very blingy, just as I wanted!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order
customer_reviews.text: So happy, other people loved them that I bought two more packages.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are a good deal, however they are hard to clip off and can get stuck. Wished it had other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. My son used it for about a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Item is pretty much worthless for a phone unless you have an ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is pretty much worthless for a phone unless you have an old phone that allows you to hang charms on it... FYI this was not an intentional purchase, was an accidental Amazon 1-Click Ordering... :-[
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great but I'm guessing you have to have some type ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great but I'm guessing you have to have some type of iPhone camera case to attach. I have a iPhone 6 & a charger case without anything to hook a lanyard like this to. Wish they had shown pictures of how to attach. Then I might have realized it wasn't what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cruising
customer_reviews.text: These were great for cruising! We didn’t like having to remove our lanyards to make purchases on the ship. These lanyards were great! You can easily pop off the bottom section, hand to a bartender or server and then pop right back on to the lanyard. They really simplified making purchases and I appreciated not having to take the whole lanyard on and off over my head. The price was great for the bunch of these and we will definitely use them again.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: Great if you misplace small items all the time
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my elderly mother, because she's always misplacing her phone - not anymore! She especially likes the quick detach feature. I suppose you could also use it to attach small, easily misplaced items, such as keys.
customer_reviews.author: DC3

customer_reviews.title: Not for point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: We got these to use with a small point and shoot camera, and one broke within about 5 minutes of putting it on. I'm glad we were just in the house so the camera didn't break when it hit the carpet. Maybe these would be ok for something lighter, but not as heavy as a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lanyard
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. These lanyards look even cuter in person. The animal faces (bear, dog, pig???) are glittery and the face on both sides. The chord is really nice with what looks like faux leather mixed with nylon. For the price; this was an excellent buy. Just got them so I can't speak to longevity. But it came 5 in the pack and at such a good price; I won't be disappointed if one doesn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper - it’s all good
customer_reviews.text: I just got my order today. Bought two pink ones a year ago & wore them out. Almost freaked when opened the pkg thinking I got wrong set because the cords are wrapped in a coil. Thought I had gotten the spring type coil ones. Seem sturdy so far. Loved the assortment of five different colors
customer_reviews.author: sukie

customer_reviews.title: She Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: The variety of colors was great and my Wife love them. It would be nice though if they lanyard came with a maybe one or two smaller connection loops that would be more or less permanently attached to the phone case. It would make it easier to swap the different lanyards out without taking the phone cover off. Just a suggestions. I am pleased with what I purchased though in all respects.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: DON'T LOOK/FEEL LIKE LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: These could very well be made of real leather, but there's a shiny coating on them which makes it difficult to tell. I'm sure the coating is to help keep them clean, but still... I was expecting them to look and feel like leather
customer_reviews.author: Bethay

customer_reviews.title: Stones fall off
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but the stones come off easily. I have only had it for about 10+ days, so it’s a bummer. Also not as long as I thought to put around neck ands shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Mejgee

customer_reviews.title: Must be Super gentle!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few months. I barely used it, and was super gentle with it, because it looked flimsy . Then one day it was tugged one good time then it broke. Now I'm using for my USBs and not my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Was asked from others where to get one. I attached my phone to this. Very durable. I bought this a second time .
customer_reviews.author: mnat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for phone, camera ext.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item I use them for my phone, I attached them to the cases and I carry my phone around my neck or hold in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: This product is nice since I can detach/attach it
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice since I can detach/attach it. But I'm just not secure about the circular part where attached/detached is since it's just plastic and I'm afraid it might break easily if I hang my phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product not only does it help with my daughters USB that she has to have for her sixth grade but it also helps with her house key. I would recommend this for anyone

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for iPhone plus
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful set, but not strong enough to hold iPhone plus. It broken after a few week use

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight necklace
customer_reviews.text: Great for lightweight things but crap for anything with weight like an iPhone!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the CONCEPT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the CONCEPT! But the cover on the cell has no holes to insert the Lanyard "string" in... What's a girl to do?

customer_reviews.title: Thought they were very cute
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke in 1 day but at least I have the other ones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and will hold up well and function well.

customer_reviews.title: Great lanyard!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hold clam shell phone on neck for elderly. Also good for other uses. Nice sturdy lanyards in a variety of colors.

customer_reviews.title: Durable hand Lanyards!
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the colors!! Well made have the on all my phone cases....

customer_reviews.title: Needed a Wrist Strap for my Selfie-Stick
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my selfie-stick. Previous reviews thought the lanyard was too short. I found it to be just right.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and lovely color
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable handle and feel secure to hold on the phone. A bag has multiple color strips to choose from. Very appealing

customer_reviews.title: breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: The small string in the Lanyard breaks or pulls out to easily.

customer_reviews.title: Be carful of button
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient but keep popping apart dropped phone on floor button keep popping in

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: 2 of them came broke and they did not last long.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy lanyards!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy lanyards! Highly recommend. Would've give all 5 stars, but while ALL of the material is of very good quality, I just 'wish' the lanyards are a little longer...just 2 more inches and it would be perfect. I will; however, make sure I am stocked up for me and other family & friends with this make & model...until I learn that Rancco makes this same neck lanyard a little longer. I will not accept any substitutes :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my small compact camera, leaving my hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Item For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got as gift for a friend. She raves about it. It's the small things that count ;)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has held up for me with moderate usage over time.

product_meta.title: Rancco Phone Neck Strap Lanyard Quick Release ID Holder Neck Lanyard,5 Pc 19" Detachable Necklace Neck Band,Office Breakaway Strings,Keychain,Whistles Strap for iPhone,ID Badge Holder,USB Flash Drive
feature_bullets: Detachable Lanyard: Lanyard with detachable buckle, easy to breakaway and connect the buckle, easy to attach and detach for stuff with lanyard port/ hole, retractable badge reels are especially useful for active work or sporting environment
Neck Lanyard: Premium breakaway lanyards, don't toxic, wear-resistant and corrosion-resistant properties, waterproof, Breakaway safety clasp design flexible and resealable lock
Quick Release Neck Strings: No matter how you twist phone necklace, it will restore prototype and the lanyard won't put pressure on your neckstrap, the lanyard won't put pressure on your neck

Multipurpose: colorful neck strap make you look fashion and unique, neck strap lanyard are suitable for factory workers, hotel staffs, students, office workers, Ideal for ID card badge holder, cellphones, music player, USB flash drive etc

Note: size:18 (L) x 0.6 (W) inch, 5 Pcs in Package, Avoid the falling of devices accidently, Not suitable for items more than 0.5kg, and Please confirm that your phone or phone cover with holes to install lanyards before order

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars269 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
